categories.intro: An introduction to nuclear reactions, nuclear reactors and their design.
categories.procdesc: These machines are used to process existing materials into ones needed for making functional reactors.
categories.gendesc: These machines harness the power of a nuclear reactor, and work together to convert it into usable shaft power.
categories.htgrdesc: These are the components to a High-Temperature Gas Reactor (HTGR).
categories.fissiondesc: These are the components to a standard boiling-water fission reactor.
categories.breederdesc: These are the components to a sodium-cooled breeder reactor, or "liquid-metal fast breeder reactor" (LMFBR).
categories.thoriumdesc: These are the components to a liquid-fueled thorium reactor. These are fission reactors, but they are markedly different from other designs.
categories.fusiondesc: These are the components to a Tokamak fusion reactor.
categories.accdesc: These machines are often required alongside the actual reactor, to produce or transport materials or to otherwise aid the reactors.
categories.tooldesc: These tools are useful to those working with nuclear reactors.
categories.resourcedesc: These items are crucial in the operation of nuclear reactors.
